text:
="preserve">The Adivasi people of India look very different from the Dravidians and Aryans. Adivasi people face discrimination and it's hard for them to get jobs in the city areas. These groups have survived in the forest and mountain regions in India for many years. They were the first to inhabit India.
Adivasis are mostly classified as Dalits which is the lowest caste in india.
Adivasi people are facing discrimination for their skin color, their beliefs and their ethnicity.
